GSP30timudghu:101: TiUdgh04.1cd: saṃśayo me mahādeva & etat kathaya sureśvara{ḥ}

GSP30timudghu:107: TiUdgh04.4ab: yo sau acintyam ity āhu<ḥ> & śivaṃ paramakāraṇaḥ
GSP30timudghu:110: TiUdgh04.5cd: kar[mm]at**hapiṇḍaṃ tu & tasya stobha prajāyate

GSP30timudghu:120: TiUdgh04.10cd: teṣu teṣu na bhetavyaṃ & krīḍate parameśvarī

GSP30timudghu:133: TiUdgh04.17ab: na jānāti divārātrau & yuktayogo varānane

GSP30timudghu:153: TimUdgh5.1cd: guro-padeśalabdhaṃ tu & bhuktimuktiphalapradaṃ %weird sandhi guropadeśa- or is it meant to be guroḥ+upadeśa-
GSP30timudghu:154: TimUdgh5.2ab: yadā saṃkrāmitajñānaṃ & tadā mukti<ḥ> suniścitaṃ
GSP30timudghu:162: TimUdgh5.5cd: mantratantreṣu ye coktā & te pi vidyā prayacchati
GSP30timudghu:165: TimUdgh5.7ab: mṛtasaṃjīvanī śubhā & stobhākarṣe tu cāruṇā %orange
GSP30timudghu:167: TimUdgh5.8ab: ripumṛtyukarā kṛṣṇā & saṅkrāme raktavarṇikā %black, red
GSP30timudghu:168: TimUdgh5.8cd: śriyā vibhāti padmābhā & muktvāṃ <*> kāntitejasā
GSP30timudghu:169: TimUdgh5.9ab: aṇimālaghimāñ caiva & mahimāṃ prāptir eva ca
GSP30timudghu:170: TimUdgh5.9cd: prākāmyaśivatattvañ ca & vaśitvaṃ yatra kāmatāḥ
GSP30timudghu:174: TimUdgh5.11ab: utpadyate guṇā yena & tam priyaṃ kathayāmy aham
GSP30timudghu:181: TimUdgh5.12ab: gopitavyaṃ prayatnena & lekhakena na lekhayet
GSP30timudghu:182: TimUdgh5.12cd: dvādaśāni ca ślokāni & saptāhena varānane
GSP30timudghu:183: TimUdgh5.13ab: nāpaṭhe dīyate tasya & karṇṇākarṇe [tu] sañcaret
GSP30timudghu:184: TimUdgh5.13cd: taṃ labdhvā tu bhave siddhi & ucchare sṛṣṭisamarasaṃ%hyperm.
GSP30timudghu:185: TimUdgh5.14ab: tatkṣaṇā bandhate mudrā & khecarī tu na saṃśayaḥ
GSP30timudghu:186: TimUdgh5.14cd: eka<ṃ> sṛṣṭimayaṃ bījaṃ & ek<ā> mudrā tu khecarī
GSP30timudghu:188: TimUdgh5.15ab: dvāv etau jñāyate yena & so pi śāntapade sthitaṃ %cf. TĀ32.64
GSP30timudghu:189: TimUdgh5.15cd: tatpade saṃsthito yogī & trailokyam api darśayet %=paśyet?

GSP30timudghu:195: TimUdgh6.1ab: kā sā saṃkrāmate śaktiḥ & kāni cihnāni darśayet %archaic gupta style rśa/

GSP30timudghu:199: TimUdgh6.3ab: ***ti kathaṃ jñeyā & kena kālena siddhidā

GSP30timudghu:201: TimUdgh6.4ab: yā sā vyāpakarūpeṇa & brahmāṇḍe sacarācare \var{brahmāṇḍe\lem \em; brahmāṇḍo \N}
GSP30timudghu:202: TimUdgh6.4cd: vyāpayitvā adhordhvena & sarvvavyāpi tu sā smṛtā

GSP30timudghu:340: TimUdgh9.1ab: katham utpann<ā> parāśaktiḥ & trailokyavyāpinī kathaṃ %hyperm.
GSP30timudghu:341: TimUdgh9.1cd: dhyāyanti yoginā sarve & mokṣamārgapradāyakaḥ %em: yoginaḥ,
GSP30timudghu:344: TimUdgh9.2cd: sarvavyāpī anādī ca & sarvadeveṣu pūjitaṃ
GSP30timudghu:353: TimUdgh9.7ab: kiṃ nu paśyati suśrotre & nityāṃ tadgatamānasā
GSP30timudghu:355: TimUdgh9.8ab: anye pi riṣayaḥ sarve & sadevāsurayoginaḥ \var{-yoginaḥ\lem \em; -yoginām \N}
GSP30timudghu:357: TimUdgh9.9ab: kiṃ nu devi purā pṛṣṭaḥ & dānavaiś ca mahābalaiḥ
GSP30timudghu:358: TimUdgh9.9cd: [ni*]vā dānavai sarv & mama śaraṇa<ṃ> te gatā<ḥ>
GSP30timudghu:359: TimUdgh9.10ab: mayāpi dhyāyitā śakti & sarvvadevais tathaiva ca
GSP30timudghu:360: TimUdgh9.10cd: āgatā tatkṣaṇād eva & parāśaktimanā mayā
GSP30timudghu:362: TimUdgh9.11cd: tayā vyāptam idaṃ sarvvaṃ & trailokya<ṃ> sacarācaraṃ
GSP30timudghu:365: TimUdgh9.13ab: ekāpi bahurūpasthā & vyāpy avasth<ā>paraṃ gatā
GSP30timudghu:371: TimUdgh9.14ab: ekā tribheda bhinn<ā> sā & bahubhedeṣu saṃsthitā
GSP30timudghu:372: TimUdgh9.14cd: tvatprasādottamā hy ekā & jātamātrā mahābalā
GSP30timudghu:376: TimUdgh9.15ab: dvitīyā madhyamā śakti & yogināṃ mukhe sthitā
GSP30timudghu:380: TimUdgh9.17ab: gurūpadeśāt saṃsiddhim & bhyāsān mokṣadaṃ padam
GSP30timudghu:382: TimUdgh9.18ab: **ṃ karotu mantreṇa & kiñci kālena sarvadā
GSP30timudghu:383: TimUdgh9.18cd: na bhavanti guṇā hy ete & divadarśanamokṣadā

GSP30timudghu:445: TimUdgh10.14ab: tṛṣkālo bhāvi{ni}bhūtasya & pañcakeṣu na dāpayet
GSP30timudghu:446: TimUdgh10.14cd: suparīkṣitaśiṣyeṣu & gupte sudṛḍhe hitañ ca
GSP30timudghu:449: TimUdgh10.15cd: tṛṇavat manyase dravyaṃ & gurorthe strīputrādikaṃ
GSP30timudghu:450: TimUdgh10.16ab: evaṃ yo vartayec chiṣyaḥ & sarvātmā ca nivedayet
GSP30timudghu:452: TimUdgh10.17ab: [\fol.38r] tvatpriyārthe mayākhyātaṃ & na deyaṃ na parīkṣitam
GSP30timudghu:454: TimUdgh10.18ab: dravyeṇa mayāyāvāpi & sevā dharmeṇa vā punaḥ
GSP30timudghu:457: TimUdgh10.19cd: dhyāyate yas tu yuktātmā & dvādaśādvānatandritam

GSP30timudghu:461: TimUdgh10.21cd: aparīkṣito dātavyaṃ & na ca nāstīkanindake
GSP30timudghu:462: TimUdgh10.22ab: māyāni na tathā kuruḥ & na deyaṃ yasya kasya cit
GSP30timudghu:463: TimUdgh10.22cd: yathā ayuktimattaśiṣyaṃ & yadi tu<ṣya>ti vai guruḥ
GSP30timudghu:464: TimUdgh10.23ab: na tasya kālam ākhyātaṃ & sadya eva nibhedayet

GSP30timudghu:466: TimUdgh10.24ab: mlecchaś cāpi pradātavyaṃ & na tu *[yā] pradāpayet
GSP30timudghu:467: TimUdgh10.24cd: śivatulyasya -m- ācāryo & loke cānugrahaṃ kuruḥ
GSP30timudghu:468: TimUdgh10.25ab: dravyalobhe pariprāpte & na tu bandhu{sva}janais tathā
GSP30timudghu:472: TimUdgh10.26cd: [pra]pū**tathā jñeyaṃ & dṛṣṭvā ca suciraṃ guruḥ %prapūjayet tathā jñeyaṃ ?
GSP30timudghu:473: TimUdgh10.27ab: nivedaye** & pūjaye ca tathā guruḥ
GSP30timudghu:474: TimUdgh10.27cd: parāsaṃkrāntiyad devi & na dadyā ca sphuṭa priye %em:
GSP30timudghu:476: TimUdgh10.28ab: arthā[r]ttha[ṃ] kiñciśaṃ vedya & nadyānaśiṣya suvrate % em: kilbiśaṃ
GSP30timudghu:479: TimUdgh10.29ab: tasmān na deyaṃ nākhyeyaṃ & sāragranthārthamokṣadaṃ
GSP30timudghu:483: TimUdgh11.1ab: kāṣṭhayogāmṛtayoga & dvābhyāṃ lakṣaṇam ādiśet %em: ādiśeḥ
GSP30timudghu:484: TimUdgh11.1cd: mokṣadaṃ sukhasādhyañ ca & tan me brūhi guṇādhikaṃ
GSP30timudghu:486: TiUdgh11.2ab: pūrvva<ṃ> yoga mayākhyātaṃ & ṣaḍaṅgaṣaḍvidhaṃ pṛye
GSP30timudghu:489: TiUdgh11.3cd: gaccha tiṣṭha tato vāpi & jagratasuptam eva ca %em:
GSP30timudghu:493: TiUdgh11.4cd: mano -m- anyatra yuñjītaṃ & dṛṣṭim anyatra pātitaṃ [\fol 39\r]
GSP30timudghu:494: TiUdgh11.5ab: tathā yoginaṃ yoga & avyucchinna<ḥ> pravarttate %em:
GSP30timudghu:496: TiUdgh11.5cd: na ca dhāraṇā vedhañ ca & nāvāhanavisarjanaṃ
GSP30timudghu:499: TiUdgh11.7ab: icchayā bhuñjate bhogaṃ & icchayā vratam ācaret
GSP30timudghu:501: TiUdgh11.8ab: nātaḥ parataraṃ devi & manohlādakaram param
GSP30timudghu:504: TiUdgh11.9cd: evaṃ yogāmṛtā devi & **āl labhyanti kaulikaṃ
GSP30timudghu:509: TiUdgh11.12ab: paśyate dehamadhyasthaṃ & vimalāyā tu yoginaṃ
GSP30timudghu:517: TiUdgh11.15ab: nānyatra paśyate hy etat & sarvayoga[ś/
GSP30timudghu:519: TiUdgh11.15cd: kath[ya]mānam aśraddheyaṃ & kim āścāryañ ca vismayam
GSP30timudghu:520: TiUdgh11.16ab: yasyeha sarvato divyaṃ & ātmā samvetti pratyayam
GSP30timudghu:521: TiUdgh11.16cd: bhāvabhrāntapriyaṃ jñānaṃ & pratyakṣa yā[vad] ātmani
GSP30timudghu:522: TiUdgh11.17ab: *yaṃ dṛṣṭe tu pratyakṣe & bhrāntijñānaṃ vinaśyati
GSP30timudghu:523: TiUdgh11.17cd: evaṃ paśyati pratyakṣe & rudraśakti<ṃ> gurupriye
GSP30timudghu:524: TiUdgh11.18ab: yad uktaṃ divyayogeṣu & sidhyate nāthā priye
GSP30timudghu:525: TiUdgh11.18cd: śaktihīnaṃ guruṃ prāpya & śiṣyasiddhi<ḥ> kutaḥ priye \var{-hīnaṃ\lem \em; -hīne \N}
GSP30timudghu:526: TiUdgh11.19ab: mūle naṣṭe drumā devi & kutaḥ puṣpaphalādiṣu
GSP30timudghu:528: TiUdgh11.20ab: viditātmā priyedyuktaṃ & sa guruḥ mokṣadam padam
GSP30timudghu:529: TiUdgh11.20cd: paraloke tu vā sarve & āgatā puna mokṣadā % puna metri causa
GSP30timudghu:530: TiUdgh11.21ab: pratyakṣapratyaya<ṃ> kaula[ṃ] & iha loke paratra ca
GSP30timudghu:531: TiUdgh11.21cd: aihikapratyaye yas tu & paralokam api sādhayet %hyperm.
GSP30timudghu:532: TiUdgh11.22ab: aihikapratyayaṃ nāsti & kutaḥ tatra paro bhavet
GSP30timudghu:533: TiUdgh11.22cd: evaṃ[\fol 40r]...ānaṃ & pratyakṣaṃ tu yadā bhavet
GSP30timudghu:539: TiUdgh11.25ab: bahavo guravo yatra & śūnyavākyam apratyayaḥ
GSP30timudghu:544: TiUdgh11.27cd: keci diśanti guru devi & saṃsārocchittikārakaḥ %hyperm.
GSP30timudghu:550: TiUdgh11.30ab: kule na yuktaṃ jātiṣu & kathyante mokṣadā bhavet
GSP30timudghu:551: TiUdgh11.30cd: kaulikena vinā devi & divyacakṣu na jā...[\fol 40v]
GSP30timudghu:553: TiUdgh11.31cd: aśaktā yogapaṭhe ca & yoginī ca gaveśayet
GSP30timudghu:562: TiUdgh12.2ab: susaṃskṛtya guruṃ siṣya & kathayet sakalaṃ parā
GSP30timudghu:563: TiUdgh12.2cd: sūkṣmā caiva param paścā & samvedya ya*sambhave
GSP30timudghu:565: TiUdgh12.3cd: paraṃ mokṣapadaṃ jñeyaṃ & divyaṃ [bh]avyaṃ tu putrakai<ḥ>
GSP30timudghu:566: TiUdgh12.4ab: na teṣāṃ mṛnmayaṃ liṅgaṃ & na [śailaṃ] rūpyakāñcanam
GSP30timudghu:569: TiUdgh12.5cd: yo... & ukto bhogan tu mokṣa*ṃ [\fol 41r]
GSP30timudghu:576: TiUdgh12.9ab: nānyatra gamanaṃ tasya & iti loka niścaya{ṃ}<ḥ>
GSP30timudghu:579: TiUdgh12.10cd: sar**ṃ yoginaṃ liṅgaṃ & parāśaktir adhiṣṭhitam
GSP30timudghu:583: TiUdgh12.12cd: divya paśyati yo deva & antarikṣe [bh/ti]pratya...
GSP30timudghu:585: TiUdgh12.13cd: manuṣyayoginā tais tu & yasya pudgalaliṅgākṛti%hyperm.
GSP30timudghu:587: TiUdgh12.14cd: kiṃ tasya pratimārūpaiḥ & yasya divyāgatisthitā
GSP30timudghu:589: TiUdgh12.15cd: kiṃ karoti -m- iti liṅga & yasya ....tā
GSP30timudghu:591: TiUdgh12.16cd: etal liṅgamahātmānaṃ & yogendra pūjayet sadā
GSP30timudghu:596: vijane kānte gupte vā & ramate tu yathepsayā
GSP30timudghu:615: bhittvā somañ ca sūryañ ca & tṛtīyāvahnimaṇḍalam
GSP30timudghu:617: bhasme vā salile vātha & jñānaśūlena vinyaset
GSP30timudghu:624: ratnānāṃ pūrṇṇa yo dadyā & yoginā śaṃsitavratam
GSP30timudghu:638: yojayet tatra -m- ātmānaṃ & tantunā saha yogavit
GSP30timudghu:652: tat kṣaṇād eva mucyante & taṃ jñānam brūhi śaṅkara
GSP30timudghu:656: kathaṃ jīvo sthito dehe & jīva jīva prakīrttitam
GSP30timudghu:657: kena jīvaty asau jīva & kena mārgeṇa saṃcare
GSP30timudghu:658: sakalas tu kathaṃ jīvo & niṣka bhavet
GSP30timudghu:659: kathaṃ paśyaty asau jīvo & ki* jīvasya bhojanam
GSP30timudghu:660: kutra vā līyate jīvo & jāyate ko tra -m- eva hi
GSP30timudghu:666: jīva prāṇam ity uktam vā & vālāgraśatakalpitam
GSP30timudghu:667: jīva śuklas tu vijñeyaṃ & yāva sa[ttve]na saṃyutaṃ
GSP30timudghu:669: tamena tu samāyuktaṃ & jīva kṛṣṇo bhave dhruvam
GSP30timudghu:676: hṛtpadman tu ***tu & adhaś cordhvañ ca dhā
GSP30timudghu:681: tasthavyomnī tadā līna & tāva niṣkalatāṅ gataḥ
GSP30timudghu:685: yāva na nośvāsa devī & tāva niṣkalam ucyate %em:
GSP30timudghu:690: dehastham paśyate jīvo & jighrate ca śṛṇot...
GSP30timudghu:691: bhukte śubhāśubhaṃ jīvo & dehe dehe vyavasthitaḥ
GSP30timudghu:692: dehaṃ tyaktvā yadā jīvo & bahirākāśam āśritaḥ
GSP30timudghu:695: tad eva nirbhayaṃ brahmā & taṃ dhyātvā sa sadāśivaḥ
GSP30timudghu:696: dhyātvā śivam ajam nityaṃ & mucyate pāpapañjaraṃ %em:-pañjarāt
GSP30timudghu:707: prāṇāprāṇasamāyukto & jīvo py eva hṛdi sthitaḥ
GSP30timudghu:721: tathaiva pūjaye nityaṃ & ātmānas tu vicakṣaṇaḥ
GSP30timudghu:724: tasya kaulam idaṃ divyaṃ & nirnnāśaṃ tu kadā cana{ḥ}
GSP30timudghu:726: ekam eva tu mūlasyā & śākhā tasya -m- anekadhā
GSP30timudghu:734: nitya[bha]vya sadā yogī & sādhaye piṇḍam uttamam
GSP30timudghu:736: na pīṭhagamanañ caiva & na balikṣetram eva ca
GSP30timudghu:740: na yoginīmelakañ caiva & na tu caryāvidhikramā
GSP30timudghu:745: na saṃdhyā agnikāryañ ca & na dravyaṃ homakādikaṃ
GSP30timudghu:756: mahāmārga yadā dṛṣṭvā & sarvatattva na saṃśayaḥ
GSP30timudghu:761: samanuprāptam idaṃ divyaṃ & yat kulaṃ pīṭham uttamam
GSP30timudghu:769: tāñ ca acchayā yogī & nirācārapade sthitaṃ
GSP30timudghu:771: ajarāmarapadaṃ vyāptaṃ & tadā mukti na saṃśayaḥ
GSP30timudghu:774: na punaḥ badhyate teṣām & padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GSP30timudghu:775: etan tu vimalan divyam & paśūnān timirāpahaṃ
GSP30timudghu:784: na nābhihṛdaye caiva & na kaṇṭhenaiva tāluke
GSP30timudghu:785: nan lalāṭe varārohe & ghaṇṭikāgre na vidyate
GSP30timudghu:787: dvādaśānte na cittasya & dvitā** na bhāvanam
GSP30timudghu:788: manasā tattva*yeṇa & na mokṣa na ca vidyate
GSP30timudghu:798: cakṣu[ḥ]śrotraṃ tathā ghrāṇa & vaktra gṛhya sadorgatiḥ
GSP30timudghu:799: nāḍī divya sureśāni & jñatvā vyāptaṃ sacarācaraṃ
GSP30timudghu:801: varjayet tāni devi & yadi -m- iccha siddhim uttamam % em:
GSP30timudghu:802: vārjayet tāni tu devi yadīcchet siddhim...
GSP30timudghu:804: na cetā na jaḍāś caiva & nātm<ā> paras tathā{ś} caiva
GSP30timudghu:806: na śūnyaṃ na pratyakṣaṃ & na dūre nāpi madhyame
GSP30timudghu:808: na dehe gagane nāpi & lolībhūte naiva ca
GSP30timudghu:809: eta yat ka ci nirmuktaṃ & sāvasthā kaulikā gatā % em:
GSP30timudghu:812: bharitāvasthāmantrās tu & yo janāti sa kaulikaṃ
GSP30timudghu:854: jīvo py eva yadā devī & puṇyapāpais tu veṣṭita<ḥ>
GSP30timudghu:859: sa muktita<ḥ> paraṃ brahma & taṃ śiva<ṃ> paramam padam
GSP30timudghu:860: mukhāgre yaḥ [pa]ramaṃ sūkṣmaṃ & dṛśyate vyomamadhyayaṃ %em paraṃ...madhyamam
GSP30timudghu:862: tas tu saṃsthaṃ mana kṛtvā & ta dhyāyasva varānane
GSP30timudghu:863: sa śivas tu **rtti & sa mokṣamokṣadaṃ śvase
